main event: An unidentified aerial object was sighted to the northwest of Narsarssuak AFB in Greenland by an Air Force Staff Sergeant and a civilian. The object appeared to climb vertically, emitting black smoke at the beginning of its ascent, before leveling off and being identified as an SB-17 aircraft by the air base later.
interesting points: The UFO was initially seen climbing vertically and emitting black smoke at the beginning of its ascent.
The sighting was made by both an Air Force Staff Sergeant and a civilian, adding credibility to the report.
The object was later identified as an SB-17 aircraft by the air base.
Known aircraft in the area at the time included an L-20, a C-54, an A-16, and an SB-17, which could have contributed to mistaken identity and confusion.
The document indicates that the visibility was excellent and the weather was calm at the time of the sighting.
witnesses: Air Force Staff Sergeant and civilian
